General.Name: Pang Rim Spinn
General.Description: Pangrim Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textile products in South Korea and internationally. It produces a range of fabrics. The company was formerly known as PangRim Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pangrim Co., Ltd. in 1991. Pangrim Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: KGIT Sangam Center, Seoul, South Korea

3.Name: Mr. Kyu-Tak  Seo
3.Title: Sr. MD of Ansan Factory & Director
